title: Citizen - very heavy serif
content:
I like this font, I would like to know the name.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174325im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cc_4331.jpg)

 [‹ Can anyone identify this typeface?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174325/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43931 "Go to previous forum topic") [CYBER Slab Serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174325/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43752 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vector

comments.content:
Stag? edit: nope. Close though.

David

I believe that would be Soho:

[http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/recentreleases/2007/soho.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174325/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/recentreleases/2007/soho.htm "http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/recentreleases/2007/soho.htm")
